name: LoyalSociety x AEML x Evanimal (1/3) White
description: LoyalSociety® x Evanimal - The Veterans Edition. Pt1/3 We teamed up with Evanimal, a former marine graphic designer located in LA, for our first collaboration; a three part T-shirt collection that truly represented the motto of our brand, “United we stand divided we fall”. Limited to 100 pieces. "Story 1/3: In the wake of a world thrust into chaos, the people must rise up and revolt against a system gone horribly wrong. The streets are lined with the dark misgivings of humantiy, but upon the sunrise awaits a new day, a day with the whisper of revolution floating just above the darkened clouds. The time is now. The day is ours." The three coloured design is screen printed on American Apparel, 100% cotton t-shirts. The designs are based on the venture Evanimal experienced whilst serving in the marines. Heres the size chart (in inches) Small: Sleeve Length 8-1/4" Chest Width 18" Front Body Length 28-3/8" Medium Sleeve Length 8-1/2" Chest Width 20" Front Body Length 29-3/8" Large Sleeve Length 8-3/4" Chest Width 22" Front Body Length 30-3/8" X-Large Sleeve Length 9" Chest Width 24" Front Body Length 31-3/8" WE SHIP WORLDWIDE! PLEASE don't forget to select your country!
